column2:
SAFETY & THE ENVIRONMENT
SAFETY
Connection terminals compliant
with standards IEC 60 309 1 & 2
Production sites certified according to
ISO 14001 and ISO 9001
Very high resistance to chemical products.
Plugs and sockets made of polyamide 6
Anti-corrosion treated screws, stainless steel
springs for the socket covers
Resistant to temperatures of -25°C to +40°C
